section.title: Globus Online
section.para:
Globus Toolkit does not provide a client with Graphical User Interface (GUI) but Globus Online provides a web GUI for GridFTP data movement.
It has the following features:
With a one-click Globus Connect (modified GridFTP server binary) installed on your local system, you can browse the local file system and transfer files and directories between the local system and remote GridFTP servers
and between two remote GridFTP servers (third-party transfers).
Supports file system operations such as creating, deleting and renaming files and directories.
